item.description:
BRAND NEW TECHNIQUES FOR SPRING From A Former Student Turned "Approach Machine"

Do you get nervous about approaching someone new and starting a conversation with them? Do you wish you knew how to approach people that you're attracted to, and talk to them in a way that will make them interested in getting to know you?

If you answered yes to either of those questions, then you're going to love this month's workshop.

We are bringing in a special guest to help you really learn from someone who is an alumni.  What this means: He used to sit in our classes and now he is coming back to help you transform by sharing everything he did to transform himself from a lonely wallflower into the most social guy in the room!

You'll learn simple, proven conversation starters that are non-threatening, and practically rejection-proof. Once you master this simple skill, you'll have the confidence to approach people in any situation, and you will know what to say to get them talking.

Imagine being at a Meetup event and gliding around the room talking with anyone and everyone. You'll surprise yourself with how easy and effortless it is to strike up conversations with total strangers and get to know them. Once you have this skill, you'll be able to make friends and attract lovers anywhere you go, anytime you want.

*************************************************
HERE'S A SMALL SAMPLE OF WHAT YOU'LL LEARN:
*************************************************


  • How you can go almost overnight from feeling fear when approaching someone new to being able to quickly walk up and talk to anyone with out fear and have them wanting to learn more about you.
  • A little know trick you can use that actually will make starting a conversation 110% easier. (Most people miss this one and its the biggest reason a conversation doesn't start.)

  • A simple secret you can do with normal words that will instantly improve your ability to start conversations with people and have them respond positively.  

  • Little-known places where people are more friendly and open to being approached.

  • The quickest way you can go from feeling fear and anxiety to become an unstoppable approaching machine where you can meet as many people as you want with out feeling like you have to force yourself.

  • And much more!

    *************************************************
    HOW TO GET INVOLVED
    *************************************************

    The meeting is limited to 35 people due to the size limitations of the classroom (we'll be moving around a lot). Our meetings usually sell out quickly, so here's what I recommend.

    #1 - Check your calendar right now, and see if you have Sunday, April 24th available. The meeting runs from 3:30pm to 5:30pm and is conveniently located in Harvard Square, less than 5 minutes walk from the red line.

    #2 - If you have that afternoon free, go ahead and RSVP for this workshop right now. Trust me, it's going to fill up fast. They always do.

    #3 - Write it in your calendar so you remember to attend, and please arrive at 3:15pm for registration and personal networking.

    The cost of the event is only $20, which is a bargain for a professional training that includes these skill-building drills + personality feedback. Please remember to bring:

    • $20 cash
    • A pen
    • A great attitude
    • And a willingness to learn fun, new things.

    I'm looking forward to seeing you there.

    Eric

    P.S. - Take down my cell number in case you have any questions about the event or if you get lost. The venue is extremely easy to find, so you should have no problems. My cell is: 617-903-7371.
item.how_to_find_us: Go in the front door. The signs will point you to the room.
item.why: Unusual tricks for approaching attractive people with out the fear - WARNING : Don't Miss Out On Spring and Your chance to meet someone new during the nice weather.
item.name: SPECIAL - Approaching Attractive Strangers Made Easy
